query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS workflow_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('fan_engagement', 'release_automation', 'revenue_tracking', 'marketing', 'collaboration', 'custom') NOT NULL,
  definition JSON NOT NULL,
  tags JSON,
  difficulty ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced') DEFAULT 'beginner' NOT NULL,
  isOfficial BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  createdBy VARCHAR(255),
  usageCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  rating DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  ratingCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  demoVideoUrl TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX category_idx (category),
  INDEX is_official_idx (isOfficial),
  INDEX usage_count_idx (usageCount)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:

  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT NOT NULL,
  category ENUM('fan_engagement', 'release_automation', 'revenue_tracking', 'marketing', 'collaboration', 'custom') NOT NULL,

  difficulty ENUM('beginner', 'intermediate', 'advanced') DEFAULT 'beginner' NOT NULL,
  isOfficial BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  createdBy VARCHAR(255),
  usageCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  rating DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  ratingCount INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  thumbnailUrl TEXT,
  demoVideoUrl TEXT,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX category_idx (category),
  INDEX is_official_idx (isOfficial),
  INDEX usage_count_idx (usageCount)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
